alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Greer; Kiowa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 10 at 3:31AM CDT until April 10 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...CRITICAL TO EXTREME FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM this morning to 9 PM CDT this evening. A Fire Weather Watch has also been issued for Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. The following bullets are for todays Red Flag Warning. * TIMING...Red Flag Warning 11 AM to 9 PM. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph. Winds are expected to shift to northerly this evening and overnight. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Lower to middle 90s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
